title: What were Rage Against the Machine songs about? - Quora

response.answer_text: They were a band centred around activism and anti-authoritarian views, using their music to advocate their political and social beliefs. Their lyrics were about political and human injustice, racial divides and government corruption.
Quasi-political views, semi-anarchistic outlook. Sounds scary but nah! They Rock the House! “Rage Against The Machine” lead singer Zac De La Roche has been extremely critical of anybody in authority!
